segments.text: Oh no, look at that sink overflowing with water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is still running, and the basin is full to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is cascading down onto the cabinets and pooling on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman drying the plate has no idea her feet are getting wet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She could slip any moment on that slick surface.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, turning to the kids, that boy is on a stool that's tilting backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching up to grab cookies from the high jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If it tips, he'll fall and get hurt badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is reaching up too, waiting eagerly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're both so focused on the cookies, ignoring the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window shows a calm garden, but inside it's chaos waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone notices before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
